review: If it were $1 I'd say buy it. The physics are just good enough you could do some time attack and have a little bit of fun. Slightly better than the physics from some of the not so good PS1 era games. Also it's funny to go to the California track and watch the AI cars flipping around and crashing. I was laughing my @ss off and for $1 it'd be worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133700543', 'num_games_owned': 242, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1553879952}
review:
In my top 5 "worst racing games ever"

Got it for free

Graphically is very bad for 2015, but i can accept it bacuse indie game (if i'm not wrong it supports VR). Sound is awful.
Gameplay is inspired by Big Rigs: AI can start the race but all cars will crash in 2 or 3 turns, handling is poor (tried the "Tokyo Drift" car... F1 cars have less grip than this)

Don't buy it

VOTE 3/10

P.S. never seen any update from devs

author: {'steamid': '76561198027267313', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 4460, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1502473476}
review:
Tags: Driving & Racing
Additional Tags: Delete Local Content & Remove from Library

Spams Steam VR constantly. Windows cursor does not disappear and has to be swept to corners. Audience are static cutouts of people. No music. Just engine sounds. Even microtapping the control stick creates rather aggresive steering wheel shifts. AI lackluster. Driving unsatisfying. View from within driving seat feels restricted. Game does not set you back on track or fail you if you tumble way off track forcing you to manually reset race. The visuals did not impress me. Removed for declutter.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010559256', 'num_games_owned': 965, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1489904577}
review:
CONS:
- Sloppy menus
- VERY sloppy models and model placement (Z-fighting, hands through steering wheel, etc.)
- Kevin MacLeod music (it may be royalty-free, but it's still sloppy as shit and I can never take seriously any commercially released game that uses it.)
- cartoonish engine sounds
- pushover AI
- I don't have VR for this bland-fest but i'm willing to bet the only "improvement" VR gives it is to make it literally vomit-inducing. As opposed to just vomit-inducing on principle.

EHH:
= deeply questionable physics (can't fault it too much here as, at the very least, it's still better than Big Rigs, which is just about the upper limit of the level of praise I'd be willing to give any aspect of this game. It actually has a collision engine and different driving surfaces unlike Big Rigs, although their implementation is still pretty sloppy.)

PROS:
+ Still a better racing game than Big Rigs.

0.5/10 only bother getting this if it's part of a bundle, and even then only as a gag to show your friends so that you can all point and laugh and cringe at it together.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VRaoHi_xcWk

author: {'steamid': '76561198301812972', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1470339049}
review: Truly an exhilirating game, with the finest of graphics and gameplay. The car selection is vast and unique, the sounds and beautiful scenery is absolutely breath-taking. The work you must have put into this game is astounding, and I do hope to see more work put into this game. Do not listen to the negative comments, they are simply Gran Turismo fanboys. I recommend this game to anyone & everyone who has a passion for true simulation racing. The development team deserves every last penny I spent on this game, as it was and will be an enlightening experience. ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561197963114441', 'num_games_owned': 1861, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1452527631}
review:
[u]物理挙動[/u]
　・突然、車が360度一瞬で大回転したりする。(竜巻旋風脚に似ている)
　・ハンドルの挙動がおかしく、変にカクカクする
　・全体的に物理挙動が非常におかしい。 

[u]コース[/u]
　・10コースが予定されている
　・現時点でプレイ可能なのは4コース

[u]AI[/u]
　・AIが何故かコースアウトして変な場所でウロウロする
　・半数のAIはゴール出来ない。どこかでハマるかコースアウト
　・コースによって異常に早くなったり、異常に遅くなったり不安定

[u]GUI[/u]
　・GUIはほぼ存在しない。 唯一の表示は順位。
　・分岐指示が無く、 コース表示も無く、正解の道が全く解らない。
　・コースには大量の分岐があり、分岐を間違えると負けが確定。

[u]良い部分[/u]
　・フレームレートは非常に高く、気持ちいい。

正直、未完成のゲームだと思う。

ほとんどのプレイヤーのプレイ時間が10分程度な事が
このゲームを表していると思う。

author: {'steamid': '76561198053755570', 'num_games_owned': 2119, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1450794221}

author: {'steamid': '76561197991007438', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1449860180}
review:
Ich bin mir sicher, dass dieses "Spiel" der Port eines grottigen Xbox-Live-Arcadetitels ist. 

Läuft auch auf den niedrigsten Einstellungen ruckelig, hat kein richtiges Menü, keinen Karrieremodus.
Das einzige, das halbwegs funktioniert, ist die Steuerung des eigenen Autos. Aber selbst ein Wechsel der Kameraperspektive bringt das verschwinden (des ohnehin unleserlichen) HUDs mit sich. Qualitätssicherung kennt der Entwickler nur vom Hörensagen. Die K.I. baut in Verbindung mit der fantasievollen Physik die schönsten Unfälle und fährt an anderer Stelle zu perfekt und uneinholbar.
http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/403434072380971005/7DCC6AD57D0F3D3198D379294380C9418854985F/
Echte Autos und Strecken wurden nicht lizensiert, dafür nachgebaut. Allerdings gibt es nur eine handvoll. Und selbst die nicht sofort spielbar. Musik funktioniert nur im Menü.
Die Strecken haben Gabelungen und Sackgassen, sehr verwirrend und frustiert schnell. 
Wie viel Liebe in das Spiel gesteckt wurde, sieht man daran, dass im Einstellungsmenü des Launchers Einträge wie 
"Fire" oder "Jump" vorhanden sind - man hat die Vorlage (Egoshooter?) nicht einmal angepasst.

Auch für 5 Cent würde ich diesen Müll nicht empfehlen, da bleibt auch kein Trashfaktor!

author: {'steamid': '76561197995680409', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1448212613}
review:
Deixando isso bem claro, antes de começar o review: é um jogo otimizado para ser jogado com VR (Oculus, etc.), mas pode ser jogado no PC sem isso.

MR é aquele jogo de corrida que você olha, acha bonito no vídeo e nas fotos mas, quando vai jogar, dá aquela sensação de "não é assim bom como esperava...".

Tudo no jogo dá a sensação de que poderia ter sido melhor otimizado: gráficos, audio, controles, câmeras, colisões, entre outros fatores. Dá a impressão de que foi lançado com a intenção de "hey, vamos nos livrar logo disso e começar a trabalhar no próximo projeto, esse projeto está se arrastando demais".

Após jogar por alguns minutos e sentir o jogo, fica aqueel feeling de que não deveria ter saido do Early Access, sério.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085615994', 'num_games_owned': 1232, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1447759335}

review:
i can't say i would actually recommend this game. i just can't.  the driving mechanics if you're into old school arcade style unrealistic driving then i say go for this. if you like need for speed stick to that. if you like full realism then this just isn't the game for you. graphics are ok. i actually like them to be honest. but everything else if steam allowed i'd say 2 out of 10 rating. i wish i could give it a better rating.


if they're still working on the game then i say it has potential otherwise i highly suggest looking at another racing game. unless you're fully ok with complete arcade style.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003878190', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 835, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1444750215}
review:
-: bugy, grafika, efekty, zvuk motorov, hudba, jazdný model a model poškodenia, kolízie, audio, trate, sporná umelá inteligencia, menu, optimalizácia, počet tratí a automobilov, atmosféra, modely vozidiel, absencia multiplayeru, cena

+: plná podpora virtuálnej reality, pohľad z cockpitu, zábavné bugy, známe trate

Verdikt: Kuchynský mixér sa dostáva pred vysávač a tým aj do čela pretekov. Fén na vlasy sa po zlom štarte rýchlo predral na pôvodné tretie miesto a pomaly dobieha prvý pár domácich spotrebičov. Ale čo to?! V zákrute pať došlo k hromadnej zrážke. Vibrátor nenechal dostatok miesta v zákrute mikrovlnke a došlo medzi nimi a nasledujúcimi jazdcami ku kolízii. Bavili by vás preteky automobilov, ktorých motor znie ako príslušenstvo z domácnosti? Ako zvrátený animák možno, no seriózne asi nie. Rovnako neatraktívnou je hra MotorSport Revolution. V prvom rade neočakávajte žiadnu revolúciu. Technické spracovanie, optimalizácia a všetko čo sa týka jazdy je na mizernej úrovni. Podivným prvkom hry je umelá inteligencia, ktorá po štarte závratne akceleruje a doslova lieta po trati. Tieto niekedy až kozmické lety však vedia vyčariť úsmev na tvári a možno ich zaradiť medzi biedny počet pozitív hry. Preto ak si chcete kvalitne virtuálne zajazdiť, tak si treba za to zaplatiť a vyhnúť odpadu ako je MotorSport Revolution.

20%

author: {'steamid': '76561198024652073', 'num_games_owned': 459, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1444765079}

author: {'steamid': '76561198036196702', 'num_games_owned': 4162, 'num_reviews': 868, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1444687351}
review:
Wow... Where do i begin? I know this is not an AAA game, so i didn't expect anything. But they really did no effort to try harder i guess...
The game doesn't have licensed cars, i'm ok with that. You can identify the cars as real models in real life nonetheless. I started the first race selecting a Nissan Silvia, when the race loaded the car that i was driving was a R34 Skyline. And of course, i was "WTF?". I was in 1st place when in the last lap the counter changed (with no car passing me) and i suddenly became 11th. And again, WTF!

Ok, i loaded the second game selecting an M series BMW. The race started fine. When i crashed the first time the car started... i don't know how to describe... literally break dance in the track. (See my screenshots). Then it didn't stopped, it fell off the ground in the map miasma, then respawned, started break dancing again, started to fly around the track and so on. This lasted for three minutes i guess. Then it fell off the map again and respawned in the start line.

So... If you want a few laughs, this is the game. If you want something similar and less buggy try SHOFER Race Driver. It's way better than this game. I don't see any mark in this game saying "Early Access" so i suppose this is the final version, so no thanks.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970052163', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1444667466}
review:
The game is buggy. I did 7 laps, but it was still lap 1 of 3. I overtook 8 cars, but I was still in position 9 (where I started)
I flipped the car totally 5 feet in the air and was able to carry on trying. AI drivers were crashing and driving off the track. Most of the time I had a flashing message stating "Wrong Way" even though I was following AI drivers around the track.....

author: {'steamid': '76561198139329099', 'num_games_owned': 469, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1426841101}
review:
[h1]“Hay juegos destinados a la grandeza y otros no. 5.6/10“[/h1]

Desde su periodo de acceso anticipado, MotorSport Revolution me parecía bastante prometedor, pues contaba con gran variedad de opciones que lo hacían bastante interesante incluyendo el uso de Oculus Rift, a pesar de los muchos errores y carencias del juego aún seguía siendo optimista, esperando pacientemente que con el lanzamiento de la versión 1.0 los desarrolladores corrigieran todos aquellos errores y probablemente mejorar el aspecto gráfico del juego.

Los controles dentro del juego son simples, permitiendo jugar utilizando un mando o teclado y ratón, por lo cual son bastante fáciles de usar y aprender. Lo malo de los controles es lo mal utilizados que están, al girar responde de manera totalmente aleatoria por lo que en ocasiones se ha quedado girando sin control al primer movimiento. Los frenos no responden correctamente y acelerar tarda bastante, podría defender lo útil que se vuelve jugar con mando, pero los controles no suelen responder como deberían.

Definitivamente lo peor del titulo ha sido la calidad gráfica, llegando a parecer un juego de 2005, lo que ha sido realmente decepcionante tomando en cuenta lo prometedor que parecía en acceso anticipado. El diseño de los vehículos sería lo más destacable, pues son las texturas que tienen mejor calidad dentro del juego. Como punto negativo sería destacar el diseño de la cabina, ya que se trata de un juego donde la cabina es parte importante de cada vehículo, ya que pudieron añadir más esfuerzo al tratar de diferenciarlas de un coche a otro.

[h1]Pros:[/h1] [list]
[*]Una gran idea aunque mal ejecutada.
[*]Aunque ya se ha lanzado el juego tiene potencial de mejorar si los desarrolladores así se lo proponen. [/list] 

[h1]Cons:[/h1] [list]
[*]Pésima calidad gráfica.
[*]Jugabilidad pobre y poco responsiva.
[*]Carece de multijugador. [/list] 

[h1]Conclusión:[/h1]
Hasta hoy no había tenido que realizar un análisis negativo, por lo que aún trato de mantener el optimismo respecto a MotorSport Revolution. Definitivamente no recomiendo este juego si no posees un Oculus Rift y a menos que tengas dinero extra o el juego este de oferta no lo recomiendo.

[url=https://spoileverything.wordpress.com/2015/03/21/review-motorsport-revolution/] Análisis completo en Spoil Everything [/url]

Este análisis fue realizado con una copia del juego facilitada por el equipo de Ghost Machine.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070691542', 'num_games_owned': 1711, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1424890830}
review: This game shows interesting with nice cars and special stages, but I believe that the price set does not reflect what may offer the game as a whole. Beyond the graphics do not often get my mind, I noticed some problems in view which resulted in improper inclusion of features such as the process of race and the pause menu. Another thing that caught my attention was the AI who fails to give a good side to the player, as the abnormality on handling in specific situations.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043478899', 'num_games_owned': 2047, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1424791508}
review:
Can't reccomend, since the game has a very high price for its poor contents.

* A.I. is very poor
* Car's HUD often hide important information, such as position and lap progression
* Poor XP system, requires grinding through the same races just to unlock the next one.
* Sloopy controls

Couldn't feel i was progressing through the game at all, but rather felt i was doing a boring grind to get to the better cars/races.

7.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198040634795', 'num_games_owned': 12253, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1424832251}
review:
My first race had my car dropped onto the track and rock around before the race started.
When the race actually started, my car veered into the wall without me pressing any directional buttons.
Simply put, the controls are clunky and become completely uncontrollable on some terrains, that is certainly some kind of "Physics-based racing."
The maps are blands, the experience system is arbitrary, and the graphics are not very good. It isn't the worst racing game but it is certainly not fun. The Menus and HUD on the other hand are some of the worst I have seen, boring and generic but worst of all, the car HUDS get in the way of information such as Laps and Position.

author: {'steamid': '76561198203861336', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 76, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1434283168}

author: {'steamid': '76561198049522806', 'num_games_owned': 574, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1423427378}
review:
I appreciate the developers taking their time in order to create and chisel what they can in MotorSport Revolution.
The game might have potential if you know what do to with it, here's some CONS about the game :

- the menu sucks for a keyboard, I mean seriously you can't use your mouse cursor
- graphics seem odd
- physics aren't even there
- handling is odd
- no option to change volume in-game, I had to use Windows' Volume Mixer
(Something else to mention, whenever I start a new race and we start everybody gets ahead of me in like a matter of seconds, but I catch up and they never catch up. Guess some AI improvement could help)

author: {'steamid': '76561198126622614', 'num_games_owned': 35, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1553361387}
review: ГОВНО ПОЛНОЕ

author: {'steamid': '76561198059235586', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1422760577}
review:
Oh boy, where does one start!  MS Revolution will go down as one of the most unremarkable and forgettable titles around.  It felt like going back in time to a playstation 1 game, the graphics are blotchy and outdated, even on the highest settings.  

This game offers nothing that the title suggests, there is nothing revolutionary about MS R.  The game's weaknesses are all too evident:

        - Laughable AI
        - Stone Age Graphics
        - Dull Engine Sounds
        - Horrible Car Physics

If you truly are mad enough to still buy this broken and hideous game then at least do yourself a favour and research it on the net.  Look up all the videos you can and then decide whether you're still keen to invest in this game.  I decided to ignore the bad reviews  posted, now i'm $14 dollars down and left with a driving game that has been uninstalled.

Don't pay attention to the amount of time spent on this game, i've spent far more than what is recorded.  I never play online, when a game downloads i disconnect from the internet to play all my games offline.  Please take the advice to research this title before jumping in to purchase,  it is a major step backwards that simply isn't worth investing in.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076884085', 'num_games_owned': 433, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1421693384}
review:
FIrst of all, the sound design was annoying, I didn't feel satisfied when racing at high speeds, instead I was just wishing my motor would shut the hell up.

Second, the AI was horrible, they crashed a lot with themselves, and sometimes their cars would flip over nothing. That would probably be best part if the game was supposed to be comical, seeing all of the cars suddenly crashing and getting wrecked may produce a chuckle or two.

Third, the game feels incomplete, what's a racing game without a tournament I ask? There are different car tiers you can unlock, ranging from the relatively cheap and slow cars to the most expensive, high performing, fast cars around, but there's no point to unlocking them, there's no drive, you unlock these tiers with experience points, not cash earned trough races and tournaments, and you unlock all the cars of a tier at once, so you don't even have to decide which cars to unlock/buy. There is no story mod and there is no upgrade system, all this game has going for it is the Oculus support.

I would not recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120284104', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1421693256}
review:
Spodziewałem się czegoś lepszego od tej gry, ale to kompletna klapa.

1. Pad Logitech F310 nie obsługiwany?!  To najpopularniejszy pad na pc!

2. Ja nie wiem kto pisał wymagania, szejść rdzeni w zalecanych? Ta gra nie ma ani grafiki, ani fizyki...

3. Nie nazwał bym tą grą "Rewolucją", jeśli już to "Portfelową Rewolocją", dla tych co nie mają z eurasami na steam robić..


Nie ma szans aby ta gra była czymś dobrym. Takie gry powinny trafiać na androida nie na PC. Zero rewolcji, zero zabawy na torze.  To nawet nie jest wyścigówka, niby jakim sposobem! Przecież tutaj możemy dosłownie wylecieć za tor i wirować w ku przestworzy.   


Zdecydowanie Nie polecam!

author: {'steamid': '76561198119390591', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 184, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1421676758}
review:
[h1][b]MtorSport Revolution[/b][/h1]
[i]I had so much hope that this game will be very interesting title however I was wrong. After seeing the pictures you can see that the game looks nicely but its a just pictures. The graphics are very poor and badly optimized. Vehicles do not have lights and control is pathetic and it looks like we were traveling cardboard box with the wheels on ice. Besides cars are not equipped with hand brakes. In short, the game looks like a free app on the phone. Cars do not have the original names however look the same as those in the real (Renault, BMW, Nissan and more) but they look too badly. The cameras are strange but the worst looks from the inside because everything is square and not expressive. The game has a lot of bugs and once I managed to get out of the map (exactly the five times I on success). I don't want to describe this game with bad side but this game does not have any good side. Wants to add at the end of it is not worth the price since early access has ended and I have no idea if this will improve the game but if they will work further to improve the gameplay maybe im gonna to change muy opinion but now my rating is 1/10.[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198030037918', 'num_games_owned': 726, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1421663364}
review: Gra nie jest za dobra. Teraz wstrzymałbym się z zakupem i poczekał jak dalej potoczą się jej losy. Czułem jak bym grał w grę z 2005. Do tego jest mała ilość tras i samochodów do wyboru. Według mnie screeny czy trailer nie pokazują jak wygląda naprawdę. A już samo menu odstrasza. Jeśli nie macie co robić z kasą to kupujcie. Ale sam bym się wstrzymał, a podobne gry można było znaleść w gazetkach kilka lat temu.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989064526', 'num_games_owned': 1343, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1421662397}
review:
This game isnt the worst race game ive played between 2014/2015 but it isnt the best one

6/10 

pros
- Collision Visual
- bot car AI 
- Gameplay

cons
- No music 
- Cars pinball on crash
- 1 line sounds
- Graphics
- Basic GUI
- No Multiplayer

At the moment the game is worth my opinion about 5,- but if they would tweak the items above it will be worth the asking price its set on now
I still say its worth buying to have some fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002157541', 'num_games_owned': 1063, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1421663742}
review:
Meine Meinung zu diesem Spiel als Motorsport-Laie.
Das Handling der meisten Autos finde ich okay. Einige driften sehr krass aber ich schätze dass das so ist bei diesen Modellen. 
Die K.I. ist Teilweise Strohdumm weil sie sich an den dämlichsten Stellen überschlägt oder irgendwo gegenfährt.
Das Schadensmodell ist etwas lasch, also ich musste feststellen, dass man erst recht oft irgendwo gegen fahren musste bis man veränderungen sah.
Das Interieur einiger Autos ist potthäßlich, während andere Autos gut aussehen innen... Versteh ich nicht ganz aber okay.
Kein Force-Feedback trotz Rumble-Gamepad (Logitech F510) 

Schwierig zu sagen. Alles in einem muss ich sagen, dass es trotz etwas hackeliger Steuerung einiger Autos recht viel Spaß gemacht hat. Das Spiel lief flüssig bei +60FPS und ist nie abgestürzt... Trotzdem würde ich es nicht für den Vollpreis empfehlen. 10€ wären angebrachter, meiner Meinung nach.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019382909', 'num_games_owned': 2091, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1421608281}
review: Po tej grze nie spodziewałem się wielkich cudów, więc nie można powiedzieć, iż czuję się rozczarowany po przejechaniu kilku wyścigów. Ale umówmy się, ta gra nie powala na kolana. Jeżeli chodzi o grafikę i fizykę gry, to można odnieść wrażenie, że cofamy się kilka ładnych lat wstecz. Co do samej rozgrywki, to dostajemy do dyspozycji to samo, co inne samochodowe tytuły, więc nie ma się co nad tym rozwodzić. Tytułowa "Rewolucja" nie występuje w tej grze, co sprawia, że ta pozycja - raczej - nie znajdzie zbyt wielu zwolenników. Nie jest to najgorsza "wyścigówka" bo jest wiele gorszych gier, lecz MSR w skali 0-10 może otrzymać naciągane 4/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063725672', 'num_games_owned': 10107, 'num_reviews': 458, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1421370585}
review:
[h1]Без Oculus Rift - смело проходите мимо!  [/h1]
[spoiler]Ну, а если вы счастливый обладатель Oculus Rift - дождитесь хотя-бы 75% скидки...[/spoiler]

Если вы продолжаете читать этот текст, то настоятельно рекомендую посмотреть видео с геймплеем игры, которое я записал, чтобы вам было легче понимать происходящее:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z8ZyNNnx3yY

[h1]Геймплей:[/h1]
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=316545474
Как я и сказал ранее, без Oculus Rift ту совершенно нечего ловить.  Гоночки крайне унылы, трассы бедны и бледны, сам игровой процесс и челендж - сводится к нулю.  Противники тупы абсолютно на всех сложностях (на приложенном видео легкая, и средняя сложности, но поверьте - на харде они такие-же тупые), которые так и норовят или сам себя опрокинуть, или кататься вокруг на одном месте, или перелетят за забор и там остаются, и вообще никак не реагируют особо не действия игрока. Не пытаются его подрезать, обогнать, как-то обхитрить, нет - они тупо едут по назначенному маршруту, а что с ними случится дальше местный интеллект не учитывает. Перевернулся? И хрен с ним, пусть лежит себе. 

[h1]Графика:[/h1]
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=348069733
Графически игра напоминает Need for Speed: Porshe (2000 года) но с огромным количеством хромированных деталей.
Текстуры низкого разрешения, угловатые модели, крайне унылое освещение, отсутствие каких-то детализированных вещей на трассах. Зрители на трибунах  - обычные, вырезанные из фотографий люди, без какой-либо анимации.
Красивого дыма, эффектов освещения, пыли и пр. - даже и не надейтесь здесь увидеть.  
Графика в игре просто ужасна, для коммерческого проекта.

[h1]Звук и музыка:[/h1]
Из музыки - одна единственная мелодия в главном меню, которая изначально выключена. Всё.
Звуки от автомобилей, наездов на грязь, удары столкновей - режут слух.  Особенно в наушниках.

[h1]Итого:[/h1]
Отвратительнейшая игра, которую нужно переработать, на более чем 90%. 
Сейчас мы имеем лишь концепт игры, но не игру. Ужасно и криво абсолютно всё. Плохая графика, плохой звук, геймплея в игре попросту нету (лучше пройти один из сотен других аналогов, которые можно найти за эти деньги).

Итог: 2.0 / 10.  Над игрой еще работать и работать....

[spoiler]А, еще можно на меня подписаться в качестве steam куратора :3
http://store.steampowered.com/curator/6857971-FanSH-Games/ [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561197993698981', 'num_games_owned': 11065, 'num_reviews': 210, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1431448810}
review:
Worst driving game of all time?  I'm not sure about that, but it's definitely a contender.  

I have never driven cars that handle like they do in this game.  Something is horribly horribly wrong with the physics in this world.  

The AI is the only reason to like the game.  It's so entertaining!  The cars just flip and slide everywhere.  Sometimes they will be driving straight ahead and just randomly fly up into the air doing flips.

These details plus the rest of the game content is not impressive, they basically need to redo the entire UI, all the game modes, everything.  Just start over. 

Since it's early access I look forward to updates, and every time I see a patch roll out I'll check back to see the progress, and update here if I see any glimmer of hope.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997401047', 'num_games_owned': 484, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1427293141}

author: {'steamid': '76561197993157621', 'num_games_owned': 6731, 'num_reviews': 156, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1459740961}
review:
I got it on the Steam Auciton for less then 2 Gem Sacks....

This game runs poorly and feels really bad and I understand why tooo.. Two Words *unity Engine* and the rest was history

This game needs to be completey re-writen on a far better game engine.. UNITY JUST SUCK and can't understand why any one use it to build a game on.

Video in.. 20+ mins  on the hardest settings... 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j97DHLO_voU&feature=youtu.be

intresting time stamps

00:30 - 01:00
02:40 - 03:05
06:00 - 06:55
08:30 - 09:00
11:00 - 13-30 (is just a bad joke in AI and game physics inc handling ect)
14:00 - end, is a bad joke as well

The handling on the cars are super life less. remmindes me of the old SNES game were the car stay in the center and world  rotates around, giving u the illusion of stearing . Hell what em I talking around F-Zero and Mario kart handle better then this dose.
AI Cars have NO WAIGHT as you can see... they just simple fall over around conors.
AI brakes WAYYYY to earily 
Don't get me started on the audio ether...

author: {'steamid': '76561198029579382', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1413713363}
review:
This game is now early access and I have tried it a little bit but the car handling is not for me, the game is alpha state in my mind, in saying that this game does have potential to grow into something great.

Recently I got to try this with Oculus and this gives the game a whole new look and works well with the Oculus I was amazed at how different it felt and looked from my 3 screen setup.

Due to my little time on the game it is hard to recommend but having the chance to try it with the Oculus  and with my triple monitor setup I can only recommend it in the following way.

If you own VR gear: I highly recommend it
If you do not own VR gear: buyer discretion should be used upon purchase

I will follow the game because I believe it has potential and hopefully it will grow with the VR industry

author: {'steamid': '76561197971397055', 'num_games_owned': 532, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1421479496}
review:
If you have a DK2 I would definitely recommend this game right now. It's still Early Access but it's already a lot of fun. Lots of different cars and tracks to play. The car feel is more on the arcade side but that's the way I like it.

The developers have wisely chosen to keep the graphics a bit lower so the framerate stays high and it works fantastically. Oculus recommends staying above 75fps at all times and it always was. It was often at 150fps (660ti). This means it's extremely comfortable to play with the DK2.

I can't wait to see how they continue to improve it and what the final game is like.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009690493', 'num_games_owned': 370, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1413752780}
review:
Gameplay : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d2r5dEVzth4
In Motorsport Revolution erwarten dich spannende Fahrzeugklassen, mit verschiedenen Fahrzeugen.
Eine vielseitige auswahl an Rennstrecken. Und starke Gegner im Einzelspieler Modus wo können gefragt ist.
Xbox 360 Controller werden unterstützt und machen das Spielen von Motorsport Revolution noch angenehmer.
Mache die ehrfahrungen in diesem Spiel was sehr Forza Motorsport und Railsport Challenge ähnelt.
Komplettes Review auf meiner Homepage : http://xxxduxy1337xxx.wix.com/pcgameworld#!motorsport-revolution/cvza

author: {'steamid': '76561198037277954', 'num_games_owned': 970, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1411074732}
review:
Oculus support is very good once you have it set up. Not straight forward to set up as is expected with most DK2 games. 

I am happy to suppoprt this game and do not regret the purchace BUT...

Logitech Driving Force GT support is currently flawed. The cars reverse on thier own when no pedals are pressed? The car handling will be improved in future updates I am sure but even in comparrison to much older games like LIVE FOR SPEED and even RACE 07. This is the reason I can not currently recommend this game. 

Thank you for supporting Oculus Rift!! Keep up the hard work and keep those updates coming I will change my review once the game breaking issue is sorted. I know that it stated supported wheels are Logitech g25/27... I get my G27 tomorrow so will re-review after I test again.

Hope this helps

author: {'steamid': '76561198002331248', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1413139904}
review:
2/10

Bought it to use with the Oculus DK2.
The ONLY thing it has going for it, is the fact that it uses the Oculus.

The cars handle HORRIBLY, a F1 racecar has more play in its suspension then my 1990 talon. SUPER sloppy handling, either the developers didn't give a crap, or they have never driven in a car.

The maps are bland and uninteresting, I played 3 races.. all of them on a circle track. (might have been the same track now that I think about it)

The graphics are crap, looks like a racing sim from the early 2000's

it crashes alot when you try and work the menu.


So yeah, if I had to do it over again, I'd spend my $20.00 elsewhere.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011628944', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1413124653}
review: Could not get it to work with my G27 wheel and graphics look a bit dated?
developer_response: Build ver 1.4.4.4 Updated today adds a Custom Input Manager, so you can map your Logitech wheel to any button config that you prefer.  We also changed the entire game to IBL rendering, so you will notice significant differences from the earlier version you played.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031507309', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1412797067}

author: {'steamid': '76561197995504559', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1410998140}
review:
Not a bad start 
I at least liked the game.
Pretty accurate control system and good line-up of tracks 
Beautiful weather effects and the system behavior of cars on the road 
I think the final will be a successful game.

Неплохое начало
Мне во всяком случае игра понравилась.
Довольно точная система управления и хорошая компановка трасс
Красивые погодные эффекты и система поведения  машин на дороге
Я думаю в финале будет удачная игра.
